remarks: Distribution of class substitution over triple conjunction. (Contributed by NM, 14-Dec-2006.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 29-Jun-2011.)  Obsolete as of 17-Aug-2018.  Use ~ sbc3an instead. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: sbc3angOLD $p |- ( A e. V -> ( [. A / x ]. ( ph /\ ps /\ ch ) <-> ( [. A / x ]. ph /\ [. A / x ]. ps /\ [. A / x ]. ch ) ) ) $.
